summary: This document consists of a series of email exchanges regarding a real estate transaction involving Steve Marshal. The emails discuss the need for title searches, meeting minutes related to the property, and the urgency of closing the deal. The correspondence highlights the coordination between various parties involved in the transaction.

persons.name: Steve Marshal
persons.context: Steve Marshal is attempting to purchase a house in Bradford and is seeking assistance with the title search and related legal questions.

persons.name: Jen Marshal
persons.context: Jen Marshal is mentioned as the spouse of Steve Marshal, who was contacted regarding the real estate transaction.

connections.description: Steve Marshal and Jen Marshal are married, and Jen was contacted in relation to the real estate transaction.

events.title: Effective Date of Purchase and Sale Agreement
events.description: The effective date of the Purchase and Sale Agreement (P&S) is noted as November 19, although the seller did not sign until November 20.

events.title: Closing Date
events.description: The closing for the property purchase is set for December 13.

keyFacts: Steve Marshal is looking to purchase a house in Bradford and is coordinating with legal professionals for the title search.
The effective date of the Purchase and Sale Agreement is noted as November 19, 2019.
The closing date for the property purchase is set for December 13, 2019.
There is a discussion about the need for an extension to the due diligence period for the title search.
Jen Marshal is involved in the transaction as the spouse of Steve Marshal.
